thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 8 of 59
thread.title: Eric

author: Eric
title: Eric
text:
There was some miscommunication at the start. I was frustrated that I had not received the information that I had requested when I was on the phone with Roman.
Roman, was very helpful and did a good job of giving me information over the phone and giving me several options for our trip. In fact, it was so much information that I could not get it all written down to share with the group.
I felt strongly enough about how well he did on the phone to call back and ask again. Roman had misspelled my name and that was causing issues with the email he was to be sending me. Once this was cleared up I received the information I needed and shared with the group. We were booked within hours of getting it.
